dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
CJ Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. In this paper, it was utilized to create a multimodal dataset by combining it with audio data.
dcterms:title: MNIST Dataset

dcterms:creator: Zohar Jackson

Hereman Nicolas
Adhish Thite
dcterms:description: The Free Spoken Digit Dataset contains audio recordings of spoken digits, which were combined with the MNIST dataset to create a multimodal dataset for the study of early fusion in multimodal representation learning.
dcterms:title: Free Spoken Digit Dataset
